Msg.Desc: "Unable to parse the XML file %s at line %d at col %d because of %s. Ensure that the installation has been done properly. "
"Xml platform initializations was not successful. Ensure that the installation has been done properly."
"Xml platform termination was not successful. Ensure that the installation has been done properly."
"The size of the message id %d in file %s has %s characters.Valid message id is between %s and %s characters."

Msg.Category: E I "The category type [ %s ] specified is not a known category type for message id %d in file %s.Only E for error , W for warning , I for information and Q for question are valid categories."

Msg.Desc: "Sub category has been specified for message %d in file %s. Only error and info messages can have sub-category."
"The output type [ %s ] specified for message id %d in file %s is not a known type.Only O for stdout , E for strerr , L for logfile and C for callback are the valid options."
Msg.ExtDesc: "The output field specifies where the message has to be displayed."

Msg.Desc: "The number of paramters in the description for message id %d in file %s is %s.This does not match the specified paramcount %s."
"The number of paramters in the message description %s do not match the paramcount %s."
"Message id not specified in the file %s.The message id is a mandatory field."
"Message category not specified in the file %s for message id %d."
Msg.ExtDesc: "E for error , W for warning , I for information and Q for question are valid categories."

Msg.Desc: "The sub category type [ %s ] specified is not a known category type for message id %d in file %s. Valid sub categories for Error category are I for input , T for tool , N for internal. Valid sub categories for Info category are P for progress"
"Message description not specified in the file %s for message id %d."
Msg.ExtDesc: "The message description contains static text and parameters.Parameters will be filled dynamically by the tool."

Msg.Desc: "Charsperline not specified in the in the file %s for message id %d."
Msg.ExtDesc: "This field specifies the number of characters to be displayed on a single line of the specified output.This limit can be specified differently for each kind of output.This limit specifies the number of characters after the parameters has been substituted."

Msg.Desc: "An unknown parameter has been defined for element %s of message id %d in file %s."
"An unknown attribute has been defined for element %s of message id %d in file %s."
"There are %s messages in the file %s whose messages are to be stored in a logfile but no logfile for the file has been specified."
"Number of ignore param fields exceed the paramcount for message id %d in file %s.For the particular message id only %s parameters are specified in the description."
"Duplicate parameter overload has been specified for message id %d in file %s."
"message id %d in file %s contains leading zeros."
"The message id %d in file %s does not start with capital letters."
"The message id %d in file %s contains words starting in capital letters in the middle of the sentence."
"The message id %d in file %s contains exclamation marks."
"The message id %d in file %s contains double quotes."
"The message id %d in file %s does not end with a full stop."
"The message id %d in file %s contains misspelled word '%s'.Suggested spellings are '%s'."
"Duplicate message id %d in file %s.Two messages cannot contain the same message id in the same file."
"Could not open banned words file %s."
"The message id %d in file %s contains mis-spelled word '%s'."
"The message id %d in file %s contains banned word '%s'."
"Catalog file %s does not exist. This file should be there in either the <cdsroot>/share/cdssetup/smi/%s or in the CDS_SITE."
"Unable to dynamically load library %s. %s Ensure that the installation has been done properly."
"Unable to get the function pointer for %s in library %s as %s Ensure that the installation has been done properly."
